pages.text: The Refinement Dev Team have worked hard to release this mod! $(br) It was originally developed to be used with Cy4Pack, but has become more then that! $(br2) The authors of the mod are ABlackPikatchu, matyrobbrt and True Penut.
The button below will lead you to the Refinement discord where you can talk with the dev team, make suggestions and report bugs!
